survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with current corporate wellness programs.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in within the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)

script.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in within the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What are the top three barriers preventing you from participating in wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs are not relevant to my needs
Lack of awareness about available programs
questions.routing_logic: If Q1 response is 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option.

script.question_text: What are the top three barriers preventing you from participating in wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs are not relevant to my needs
Lack of awareness about available programs
script.routing_logic: If Q1 response is 'Neutral', 'Dissatisfied', or 'Very dissatisfied'

questions.question_text: Please describe any improvements you would suggest for the corporate wellness programs.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any improvements you would suggest for the corporate wellness programs.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the corporate wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.
